General.Name: Taiwan Optical Platform Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. operates as a channel copyright distributor. It also engages in the provision of investment, shareholding, consultancy, and channel copyright agency services; production of TV shows; information maintenance services; online shopping services; wholesale and retail of telecommunications equipment; film production and distribution of films; and advertising businesses. The company was formerly known as Bao Yue Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. in January 2013. Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Shu-Ling  Lin
2.Title: CFO and Accounting Officer (Financial Supervisor & Accounting Supervisor)
